comments.body: "Event All in August Roobet"Material: WoodTools: Special tools for wood carvingType: Traditional Carving Size: 25x30 cmDuration: 10 dayCelebrating the Roobet Augutu event, the theme this time I took from the Roobet event.The front part looks like Roobet with a welcome to the August Event and I include the Red and White Flag (Indonesian flag) because August coincides with the Independence Day of the Republic of Indonesia. On the back, I carved some information about the "All In August" Roobet Event, like an inscription that displays information on the August event. Using color paint and wood varnish that makes the carving more aesthetic and shiny.regardstaufik123 VIDEO REVIEWFull Album Carving Processhttps://www.talkimg.com/album/oePRoobet Username: taufik123bech32 BTC address: bc1qcqf82ys3afxx04ga89rgew7hhn75e0hz6cnxcu[/quote]

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.created_time: August 05, 2023, 04:04:21 PMLast edit: September 06, 2023, 06:24:38 AM by Hatchy
comments.body: Hello @hamphuz and Roobet, I want to express my gratitude for this wonderful opportunity to showcase my artistic skills here on Bitcointalk through this competition. This is my first Art contest since joining the Bitcoin Talk community in April. My first submission features an anime-style digital artwork of mr roobet in a card style frame. It's august, a month of good harvest and lots of big wins.Category: digital arttool: Adobe drawlink to art sequence on imgur                     °|||°* https://i.imgur.com/P53z1eS.gifv * As for my second entry, I decided to create a 2D animation with a beginner-friendly style. This animation portrays Mr. Roobet in a different universe in his new August mission, but was attacked by some bots and it became an unforgettable mission.category: Animation(2d)Tool: Flipaclip+Adobe animateheres a link to the animation on YouTubeMr Roobet in the multiversehers is also a link to the behind the making film still on YouTube. Behind the makingROOBET USER NAMEHatchy7578BTC ADDRESSbc1q3s4jzryhp2lr7eynhlzvecx6egqmvq43w2ntqt

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Heya!I am wondering if there is any particular event that is extremely important that happened in the month of August, especially in Roobet. I am sure I am missing out on something that makes August unforgettable.As funny as it may sound, at first, I thought that August has something to do with World Breastfeeding Week. However, after a few weeks, I realized that creating artworks in line with that theme would be inappropriate. LOL

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on August 27, 2023, 08:18:05 AMHeya!I am wondering if there is any particular event that is extremely important that happened in the month of August, especially in Roobet. I am sure I am missing out on something that makes August unforgettable.As funny as it may sound, at first, I thought that August has something to do with World Breastfeeding Week. However, after a few weeks, I realized that creating artworks in line with that theme would be inappropriate. LOLLol I checked myself and that's real  Maybe it's inappropriate here but if you have made that you can pm it to me and I'll decide  Even we have International Left Handers Day. So, Happy International Left Handers Day to my mom and all of left handers here!Since it's the end of August I was expecting many artworks submitted here but seems I came too early. Good luck guys!

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: I'm extending this contest by 1 week, so make sure to submit your work before the 6th of September!

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on August 30, 2023, 02:10:00 PMI'm extending this contest by 1 week, so make sure to submit your work before the 6th of September!I was just about to send in my entry, but your post made me change my mind. It seems there will be more time available for those who have only just seen this post. There are days when I check this post and observe that no one has given it a "bump" in this thread. I was about to do that, but not doing it will not only give me a chance to win the contest but also others that already know the contest. It might seem selfish, but that's just the way it is.For now a sneak peek of my entry.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on August 30, 2023, 02:10:00 PMI'm extending this contest by 1 week, so make sure to submit your work before the 6th of September!Slightly breathless this time.Completed 80% of the work for this theme.Difficulty only on August theme.Quite confused at first, what event is happening. But looking at the roobet website, it's an "All in August" event and I'm also collaborating with events in my country.
